pattern.name: Jacaranda Bloom Coaster
pattern.overview: A decorative floral coaster inspired by blooming jacaranda trees. Perfect for adding a springtime touch to your table setting. This quick project is great for using up leftover yarn and makes a lovely handmade gift.
